page.title: 15Play in the Village
page.content: I like living in Barrow Hill.You have enough room to play and take the dogs out.When the sun is out you can sunbathe.When it gets hotter you can play hide and seek.When it is burning you can go to sleep or make a den or go with your girl friend to the pub for a drink or play football all day. You can go swimming on Sunday as well as the other days of the week.You can go for walks with your friends or exploring in the woods or down to Foxstone Dam to play in the stream. There is always lots to do.
